attributes.action: All MP's should be held accountable for going against the referendum result.
attributes.additional_details:
17.4 million people of this country voted leave,
MP's should all unite and accept the result and come together and get this country out of the Eu,  
Anything else is a total betrayal.
attributes.background:
The people of this country have spoken through the referendum to leave the EU,  some MP's are going against the result and are trying to derail or stop brexit altogether, 
This was the people's choice, not MP's not government not lobby groups not the prime minister.  
Us the people.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the UK Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.

You could sign this petition instead if it is something you would like to see happen:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/221747
